text.jpText:
ついにやってきた『有馬記念』当日。
ナリタブライアンとヒシアマゾンの対決を
見届けるため、多くの観客が詰めかけていた。
text.enText:
The day of "Arima Kinen" finally arrived. 
The day of the "Arima Kinen" had finally 
arrived, and many spectators had gathered 
to watch the showdown between Naritabu Ryan 
The day of the "Arima Kinen" was finally 
here, and many spectators had gathered to 
watch the showdown between

text.jpText:
ナリタブライアンは思いを馳せる。
トレーナーと出会い、歩んできた日々は、
多少なりとも渇きを癒してくれるものだった。
text.enText:
Narita Bryan recalls. The days she had met 
and walked with her trainer had more or less 
quenched her thirst.

text.jpText:
今年最後の大舞台、
『有馬記念』がついに幕を開ける――！
text.enText:
The last big event of the year, "Arima 
Kinen," will finally begin!
